mapper.sql: id, title, type, is_viewable, is_important, is_new, company_id, create_time_utc, create_user_id, update_time_utc, update_user_id
mapper.insert:
insert into lt_notification
id,
title,
type,
is_viewable,
is_important,
is_new,
company_id,
create_time_utc,
create_user_id,

content,

mapper.update:
update lt_notification
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
is_viewable = #{isViewable,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_important = #{isImportant,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_new = #{isNew,jdbcType=TINYINT},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time_utc = #{createTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time_utc = #{updateTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update lt_notification set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, is_viewable = #{isViewable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_important = #{isImportant,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_new = #{isNew,jdbcType=TINYINT}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time_utc = #{createTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time_utc = #{updateTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update lt_notification set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, is_viewable = #{isViewable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_important = #{isImportant,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_new = #{isNew,jdbcType=TINYINT}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time_utc = #{createTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time_utc = #{updateTimeUtc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select n.*,c.name as companyName from lt_notification n left join lt_company c on n.company_id=c.id order by n.create_time_utc desc
mapper.insert:
insert into lt_notification (title, content, is_new, company_id, create_time_utc) values
(#{item.title}, #{item.content}, #{item.isNew}, #{item.companyId}, #{item.createTimeUtc})
